definition[0]: used to remind someone to do something
example[0]: We need bread, milk, and eggs – don’t forget.
example[1]: Don’t forget to lock up when you leave.
definition[1]: used to remind someone about an important fact or detail that they should consider
example[2]: But don’t forget that you have to pay interest on the loan.
example[3]: Don’t forget, I’ll be home late tonight.
definition[2]: used to remind someone to take something with them
